    Package Description
    board.token

    • Uses of Suggestion in board.token

      Methods in board.token with parameters of type Suggestion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Player.canRefute(Suggestion suggestion)
      Checks if the player can refute by checking the players hand to see if the player has a card that was refuted.
      boolean Player.isSuggestionCard(Suggestion suggestion, java.lang.String name)
      Used when a player is refuting, to check if the name of the card the player inputted is a name of one of the cards in the suggestion.
